results.doc_title: Nikita Gorshkov - Appt Booking (Gabriel Gregório (Senior Product Analyst)) - 2025/12/18 15:29 CET - Notes by Gemini
results.meeting_purpose: Job interview/screening call for an analytics role at Nikita Gorshkov's company

action_items.task: Review Gabriel Gregório's candidacy for the analytics position

key_points: Gabriel Gregório shared experience in data visualization for a wellness company, providing insights on user activity around gyms with localized metrics
Created dashboards showing subscribers within radius of gyms, nearby gym types, and new users from subscription changes, which enhanced sales team negotiations
Discussed strategies for shortening time to market including parallel experiments using social media surveys and third-party small-group testing alongside A/B testing
Provided example of two-way messaging for payment reminders at a bank as faster alternative to website changes
Suggested Brazil-specific qualitative methods: in-app surveys with discounts, pop-ups for ratings (Brazilians responsive to in-app interactions)
Recommended quantitative validation methods focusing on measurable goals like potential new users and order frequency through campaigns
Discussed Brazilian market characteristics: meal prep culture exists with small local businesses, premium users who go to gyms and focus on healthy eating
Company (HelloFresh/similar) has not expanded to Brazil due to requirements around meat culture, pricing, and infrastructure considerations
Company is globally hiring for analytics role
blockers: Standard A/B testing takes significant time, limiting ability to run multiple experiments in parallel
Brazil market expansion blocked by pricing profitability concerns, meat culture requirements, and infrastructure needs
follow_ups: Hiring decision for the analytics role

results.doc_title: AI Bytes Assemble - 2025/12/18 12:55 CET - Notes by Gemini
results.meeting_purpose: Align on expectations, group boundaries, and core focus for integrating GenAI into the end-to-end software development lifecycle, specifically for acceleration and platform team initiatives
attendees: Someone in BER - P89-L4-Dim Sum (Berlin Campus - Prinzenstraße, L4)

decisions.what: Immediate focus should be on small, high-value automatable pieces
decisions.context: Agreed to prioritize improving the design system check to ensure Figma files are 'Zestifiable' and packaging solutions for handover stage within Spec Machine

decisions.what: Conduct a pilot with customer-facing teams
decisions.context: Treat the onboarding process as a scientific experiment

decisions.what: Need to sit together to review list of teams and defined quality parameters
decisions.context: Alignment on quality standards and team selection for pilot

action_items.task: Define quality parameters for AI adoption
Potentially hand over tasks to Kudlo
Review list of teams for pilot program
Define target goal for AI adoption and quality parameters

key_points: Focus on integrating GenAI into end-to-end software development lifecycle
Platform team initiatives include React Native migration and accessibility efforts
Improving design system check to ensure Figma files are 'Zestifiable'
Packaging solutions for handover stage within Spec Machine
Treating pilot onboarding as a scientific experiment
Concerns about AI adoption creating tech debt and quality issues based on experiences from other companies
Need for foundational layers (Spec Machine) to create effective flywheel
Concerns about cost implications of parallel agent operations
Importance of defining quality parameters before proceeding
blockers: Risk of AI pilot being shut down or creating more tech debt and quality issues (based on other companies' experiences)
Potential cost concerns - risk of 'bankrupting' the company with uncontrolled AI agent operations
Compatibility concerns with German workforce and works council regulations
Missing defined quality parameters and target goals for AI adoption
Team member on vacation the following week with limited availability
follow_ups: Define quality parameters for measuring AI adoption success
Review and finalize list of customer-facing teams for pilot
Establish metrics for the pilot experiment
Address cost management for AI agent operations
Ensure foundational Spec Machine layers are in place for all teams
